item.title: Dog Chew Toys for Puppy Teething – 20 Pack Indestructible Pet Dog Toys for Puppy Chewers, Interactive Tug of War Rope Toys for Puppies, Small Dogs Durable Squeaky Toys for Boredom Chew Teething

item.content:encoded:
Price: $22.98
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:26:48 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Let’s protect your home and help dogs have more fun!

Dogs are known to be terrible chewers when they feel alone and grow teeth. Now, our family chew toys can protect your shoes, clothes, and even your furniture!

KILL ALL NEGATIVITY TO BUILD MORE POSITIVE ENERGY ALL DAY !

4 x Rubber Dog Chew Toy

Made of natural rubber, it is more flexible, durable and safe for your dog to chew and clean his teeth. Allow your dog to breathe better and have a healthier mouth. The cute design makes it easier for your dog to grasp. Puppy chew toy has small dimples that can really soothe your puppy’s gums. Brightly colored dog chew toys are easy to use and can satisfy your dog’s natural urge to chew.

10 x Rope Dog Toy

Tightly hand-woven cotton rope toys for tug-of-war and catch games. With a large selection of rope toys, you can easily replace damaged toys and actually have a longer life span. Your pup will have fun playing with them while keeping them off your shoes or furniture.

1 IQ dog funnel ball and 2 loofah tooth cleaning dog toys

Made of hard plastic, these snack dispensing balls are durable and suitable for dogs to chew. The surface has a regular texture so it won’t roll too far and your dog can easily grab it. Also, your dog will love tossing and rolling the ball to remove treats when they hear the cute squeaking sound.

Perfect Gift for Puppies

20 Pcs valued puppy chew toys great size for teething puppies. An Idea Choice for Your Puppies!

Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 9 x 7.8 x 3.93 inches; 2.4 Pounds
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ September 30, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ qinhe
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09HJR2GBB

【Small Puppy Toys For Furniture Protection】: Are you worried about your puppy chewing on the sofa, shoes, boredom, loneliness and releasing energy while teething? ​Our toys are designed for puppy teething to help change your puppy’s bad chewing behavior, stop worrying, and keep your furniture safe. These puppy chew toys for teething not only clean the incisors, but also help clean the plaque hidden in dead spots, removing plaque and preventing cavities. Keep your puppy’s teeth healthy!
【Interactive Training Small Dog Toys】: The snack ball is a great teething toy for dogs, and it can improve their IQ as they learn to toss and roll it for snacks. When dogs receive a healthy balance of physical and mental stimulation, they feel happy and well-adjusted. A variety of rope toys are perfect for tug-of-war, tossing and fetch games that promote relationships while interacting with your pet. Buy our puppy chew toys and make your dog smarter and happier!
【Safe And Tight Puppy Teething Chew Toys】: The dog rope toy is made of 100% natural washable cotton, non-toxic and odorless, so your pet can chew and play safely. Our cotton rope dog toys are thin, but tough and durable. The wisdom balls and dog bones are also very chewy. If your dog is an aggressive chewer, then these puppy toys are not indestructible. They should only be played with under supervision. Dog toys bulk also keep the toys fresh in your dog’s mind
【Quality Gifts And Service】: This puppy teething toy set is a great gift for friends who have puppies. It is also a great gift for your little family member. From fun indoor activities to outdoor play with your dog, just one set of puppy chew toys is enough to give your dog more fun and exercise in his daily life! If you have any questions about our products, please feel free to contact us, we are always ready to help you solve your problems!


Let’s protect your home and help dogs have more fun!

Dogs are known to be terrible chewers when they feel alone and grow teeth. Now, our family chew toys can protect your shoes, clothes, and even your furniture!


KILL ALL NEGATIVITY TO BUILD MORE POSITIVE ENERGY ALL DAY !

  • Made of natural rubber, it is more flexible, durable and safe for your dog to chew and clean his teeth. Allow your dog to breathe better and have a healthier mouth. The cute design makes it easier for your dog to grasp. Puppy chew toy has small dimples that can really soothe your puppy’s gums. Brightly colored dog chew toys are easy to use and can satisfy your dog’s natural urge to chew.

10 x Rope Dog Toy

  • Tightly hand-woven cotton rope toys for tug-of-war and catch games. With a large selection of rope toys, you can easily replace damaged toys and actually have a longer life span. Your pup will have fun playing with them while keeping them off your shoes or furniture.

1 IQ dog funnel ball and 2 loofah tooth cleaning dog toys

  • Made of hard plastic, these snack dispensing balls are durable and suitable for dogs to chew. The surface has a regular texture so it won’t roll too far and your dog can easily grab it. Also, your dog will love tossing and rolling the ball to remove treats when they hear the cute squeaking sound.

item.description: Price: (as of – Details) 🌏 REAL ZERO WASTE: Gorilla poop bags only take 12-36 months to begin breaking down under sunlight by EPI technology and are ASTM D6954 certified. Additionally, we created true Zero Waste through coreless rolls and recyclable packaging. We strive for a better environment for you and your dog to live ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $18.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:21:22 UTC – Details)



REAL ZERO WASTE: Gorilla poop bags only take 12-36 months to begin breaking down under sunlight by EPI technology and are ASTM D6954 certified. Additionally, we created true Zero Waste through coreless rolls and recyclable packaging. We strive for a better environment for you and your dog to live in.
LEAKPROOF & DURABLE: Our extra thick and sturdy unscented poop bags are strong enough to pick up your dog’s poop without the risk of tearing. Keep your hands clean and away from bad smells with 100% waterproof materials. Our bags are designed to lock away odors and guarantee a mess-free leakproof seal.
RELIABLE US COMPANY: We are an Illinois based small business that loves doggies. Customer satisfaction is always our first priority, and the customer trust we have built up over the years will prove this. We continue to strive to provide the best quality at an affordable price. Don’t hesitate to send us your feedback by message.
SUPER VALUE PACK: Great price for 1000 count poop bags (50 rolls with 20 bags per roll) with 1 bone shaped patented dispenser. A value package is sufficient for more than a year’s use. Our pet waste bag is designed for your convenience. Each large pet waste bag measures 9 X 13 inches, that is enough capacity for all sizes dogs and cats. SAVE UP TO 10% with Subscribe & Save.

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;

if (errorDiv) {

onlineUrl.value = ”;

onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,

offlineYear,

Motor Trend Waterproof Car Seat Covers for Front Seats – Padded Neoprene with Two-Tone Stitching, Easy to Install Automotive Seat Covers, Universal Fit for Cars Trucks Vans and SUVs, Gray Stitching. Universal fit design for pick-up trucks, hatchback sedans and most other types of car, truck, van & SUV. Also works great as a baby, pet, or dog seat cover. Perfect car accessories for rideshare drivers too!
PROTECTS AGAINST STAINS – These are the perfect seat covers for your new car, or even a car that’s just new-to-you. Our front seat covers offer protection against spills and stains that might occur inside of your vehicle while also refreshing the look of your interior. Bucket seats dimensions-Back Height-2 feet. Width-1 feet 9 inch. Bottom Length(fr. the back)-1 feet 6 inch Width-1 feet 10 inch
WATERPROOF LINING – Have peace of mind knowing that your seats are protected in the case of an accidental spill. We use a waterproof neoprene foam lining on the inside of our seat protectors for maximum protection against spills.
MODERN DESIGN – Our universal fit seat covers feature a modern ‘side-less ‘design that is fully compatible with any built-in airbags and armrests found in newer vehicles. No modifications required, simply install and you’re all set
EASY TO INSTALL – The best investment for your new vehicle might also be the quickest. Follow our simple 3-step installation process to install the front seat covers before finishing off with the head rest covers.
UNIVERSAL FIT – Our front seat covers are designed to fit most vehicles including cars, trucks, vans and SUVs. Please see our product images for fitment examples. Some additional work may be required to create a ‘perfect’ fit.



Motor Trend SpillGuard Waterproof Car Seat Covers

Front Seats Only

These are the perfect seat covers for your new car, or even a car that’s just new-to-you. Our front seat covers offer protection against spills and stains that might occur inside of your vehicle while also refreshing the look of your interior.

Modern Design

Our universal fit seat covers feature a modern ‘side-less ‘design that is fully compatible with any built-in airbags and armrests found in newer vehicles. No modifications required, simply install and you’re all set!

Details

  • Protects your seats against spills and stains.
  • Breathable materials for maximum comfort during your commute.
  • Waterproof neoprene foam lining repels water and other liquids.
  • Universal Fit for Most Vehicles.
  • Easy to Install.

Refresh the Look of Your Interior

These are the perfect seat covers for your new car, or even a car that’s just new-to-you. Easily refresh the look of your interior in minutes.

Sideless Designs for Built-In Armrests

Our universal seat covers are fully compatible with side airbags and armrests. Universal fit for most vehicles including cars, trucks, vans and SUV. Please check dimensions before installation.

Waterproof Neoprene Lining

Have peace of mind knowing that your front seats are protected in the case of an accidental spill. Waterproof neoprene foam lines the inside of our covers to provide maximum protection.

Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $9.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:02:42 UTC – Details)


HEAVY-DUTY BAGS DESIGNED WITH MOTHER NATURE IN MIND

Looking for heavy-duty dog poop bags that don’t easily break?

Smarter waste bags that you can confidently toss in the trash?

Then you’ll love our new and improved doggy bags!

We went back to the drawing board and created extra-strong leak-proof bags made using a
special ingredient. The secret behind this smart technology? A certified additive known as d2w.
It shortens the life of our bags at the end of its useful life when it ends up in the open
environment.

So you get to throw your pet’s waste without destroying the environment.

Here are more reasons you’ll love these strong poop bags:

  • – Made with 15 microns-thick plastic for greater strength.
  • – Well-sealed seams prevent the bags from ripping.

– The opaque design masks the contents of the bags.- Scented with a jasmine fragrance that keeps odor at bay.- Very easy to separate from the roll thanks to high-quality perforations.- Sized at 13” (L) x 9” (H) to handle poop from all breeds.- They leave you enough room at the top to create a knot.- Backed by a 100.

Go ahead, get heavy-duty biodegradable poop bags that you can toss guilt-free!
Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 6.97 x 5.12 x 2.76 inches; 1.19 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ PH-240T
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ July 8, 2016
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Best Pet Supplies, Inc.
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B01HIM19HK
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

Environmentally Friendly Degradable Plastic – Our pet waste bags are infused with a D2W additives which helps them break down more quickly than traditional plastics, which makes them more eco-friendly if they do reach a landfill
Quick Cleanup Made Easy – Our versatile doggy poop bags are thicker, more durable, and feature easy-tear perforations to make it easier to pull a single one away from the roll. This means less time standing around and more time cleaning up
Supports Small to Large Breed Dogs – These degradable dog poop bags are 13” x 9” in size which make it easier to pick up and safely store messy feces and deposits for all types of breeds, including chihuahuas to boxers to Labradors
Trusted Quality Assurance – Here at Best Pet Supplies we make pet poop bags and pet accessories that support owners and their four-legged friends. If you have any questions, please reach out and we’ll provide fast, reliable support

Read more

Lightly Scented

Our doggie poop bags are lightly scented to help mask those smelly odors. This is especially important if you need to walk some distance before you find a trash can or have to keep it in the car until you get home.

Fun Colors & Patterns

Who said poop bags have to be totally gross? We offer doggie poop bags in a variety of pet and owner-friendly colors including pink hearts, cute paws, bones and much more!

Thicker & Resilient Bags

Standard poop bags often tear or leak, especially if you have a larger dog. We’ve made our plastic bags 15 microns thick to withstand those late-night poop walks, dog park excited poops and all the other messy situations a pet owner winds up in.

Easy-Tear Perforations

Every bag is cleanly perforated and easy to tear off from the roll. The opaque design masks the contents of the bags. Try our dog waste bag dispensers to keep them on hand when it is needed!

Read more

UNIVERSAL FIT – We made these car seat covers for dogs of all shapes and sizes! From tiny smart cars to SUVs, our car seat protector is sure to fit like a glove.
EASY TO CLEAN – Dreading the shedding? No worries – even if your furry friend gets hair everywhere, our back seat cover for dogs is made with 600D Oxford waterproof cotton for easy vacuuming and cleaning.
PET PROTECTION – Safety first! 4 heavy-duty headrest anchors and 2 seat anchors keep this dog back seat cover completely in place, so your pet doesn’t slip and slide around (even on the bumpiest rides).
CUSTOMER SATISFACTION – Have any questions, comments, or concerns about your dog car seat cover? Our customer satisfaction team is purr-fectly happy to give you a helping hand (or paw)!

Non-slip Rubber Backing

Keeps your bestie safe and secure in the backseat with no slipping or sliding — even on the bumpiest rides.

4 Adjustable Buckle Straps

Adjust straps to fit around your headrests as needed and attach them to secure the cover.

Hook-and-loop Openings

Allows seat belt buckles to fit through the cover for passengers to ride with your pet.

2 Seat Anchors

Tuck into the crevices of your car seats to keep the cover securely in place.

(as of Nov 30,2022 04:37:50 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Seat Covers to Fit Any Need

Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 10.24 x 8.27 x 4.33 inches; 2.82 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ A275
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ December 23, 2017
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Active Pets
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B07G642RMQ
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

UNIVERSAL FIT – We made these car seat covers for dogs of all shapes and sizes! From tiny smart cars to SUVs, our car seat protector is sure to fit like a glove.
EASY TO CLEAN – Dreading the shedding? No worries – even if your furry friend gets hair everywhere, our back seat cover for dogs is made with 600D Oxford waterproof cotton for easy vacuuming and cleaning.
PET PROTECTION – Safety first! 4 heavy-duty headrest anchors and 2 seat anchors keep this dog back seat cover completely in place, so your pet doesn’t slip and slide around (even on the bumpiest rides).
CUSTOMER SATISFACTION – Have any questions, comments, or concerns about your dog car seat cover? Our customer satisfaction team is purr-fectly happy to give you a helping hand (or paw)!

Non-slip Rubber Backing

Keeps your bestie safe and secure in the backseat with no slipping or sliding — even on the bumpiest rides.

4 Adjustable Buckle Straps

Adjust straps to fit around your headrests as needed and attach them to secure the cover.

Hook-and-loop Openings

Allows seat belt buckles to fit through the cover for passengers to ride with your pet.

2 Seat Anchors

Tuck into the crevices of your car seats to keep the cover securely in place.

Read more

Price: $45.00 - $36.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:31:03 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Since our founding in 2009, we’ve aimed to make the highest-quality products while giving back to shelter and non-profit organizations.

As a B Corporation, making things better, for dogs and people, is the reason we’re excited to come to work each day.

Earth Rated Refill Rolls

Earth Rated Grooming Wipes

Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 8.5 x 5.51 x 7.52 inches; 4.21 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ BIOSINGLE60
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ June 15, 2012
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Earth Rated
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B008BGRXXM
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

FOR ALL PUPS AND POOPS: Extra long, extra strong bags to accommodate any size poop. These bags are designed to fit our included dispenser, or any standard sized dispenser like a glove.
MORE BAGS, MORE WAGS: A whopping 900 poop bags (60 rolls x 15 bags each) plus 1 Earth Rated dispenser. Because there’s no such thing as too many poop bags.
GIVING BACK SINCE 2009: Your purchase from Earth Rated helps support animal shelters, rescues & non-profit organizations. As a B Corporation, making things better, for dogs and people, is the reason we’re excited to come to work each day.
OFTEN IMITATED, NEVER POOP-LICATED: Official Earth Rated dispenser made to fit our rolls of 9″x13″ poop bags in both lavender scented and unscented. Perfect for small, medium and large dogs.

Product Description

UPDATE MATERIAL: 100% natural rubber and is non-toxic, durable enough for dog chewing.

Great for interactive indoor and outdoor play.

WANT TO EXTEND THE PLAYTIME?

Be sure to entice with a dash of peanut butter or similar paste-like food in the grooves, dogs will never stop obsessed with it.

HIGH DENSITY RING DOG TOY

with sufficient toughness was born to chew

Built for long-lasting engagement and promotes your dog’s strong jaws. discouraging destructive chewing, combat boredom and relieve anxiety or frustration. Soft and bouncy material keeps it never hurt puppy’s mouth or teeth when chewing.

Help your dog spend his boundless reserves of energy with the ring dog chew toy. This long-lasting chew toy will provide hours of playtime for you and your furry friend.

WHY DOGS NEED IT?

THICK RIM STANDS UP TO TOUGH CHEWING LAYERED TEXTURES BUILT FOR LONG-LASTING ENGAGEMENT AND ENTERTAINED FOR HOURS NUBS DESIGN TO REDUCE PLAQUE AND TARTAR HELP SATISFY DOG’S INSTINCTUAL NEEDS AND PROVIDES MENTAL STIMULATION.

All-STAR OF DOG TOYS VALUE SET OF 14!

Puppies explore the world by chewing, various types available for 2-3 toys timely change, that’s help puppies to stay curious, develop intelligence. JUST BUY ONE, get the combination of dog teething toys, chew toys, rope toys and interactive toys, every part of our dog toy pack is necessary, cooperate to keep dog happy chewing. The most valuable team works better for the dog’s healthy growth.

JUST CLICK IT, you can get all you need here.

Chewing is a great way for dogs to communicate, encourage it without being destructive helps to keep dog’s right chewing behavior from an early age. Rubber ring toy has a long-lasting, high bouncy, by chewing it, satisfy dogs’ instincts and relief the stress caused by boredom or anxiety. Want to extend playtime? Be sure to entice with a dash of peanut butter in the grooves.

4 adorable chew toys are specially designed for teething puppies and small dogs, including one heart-shaped toy, one star-shaped toy, one key-like toy and one biscuit-like toy, Teething puppies have strong chewing desire out of the pain from gum soreness, inflammation and teeth shooting. Chewing our soft and flexible rubber toys will help massage gums and relieve stress, which is good for teething in return.

Cotton rope dog toys are classical type, great for tug of war games. Your doggie will have a fun time while keeping your home tidy and clean. Also act as teeth floss, deeply clean the hidden germs.

High bouncy dog ball toy is great dog training toys, benefit your furry friends. They running, jumping to get the toys, that training dogs’ reaction and leaping ability, positively enhance the relationship between you and your dogs.

2 plush dog squeaky toys feature a inner squeaker, not too loud but still get the dog’s attention.

we recommend supervised play, timely replacement of the broken ones.

Please kindly give us an opportunity to fix if it didn’t meet your expectation, we will provide the best solution for you.

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 14.21 x 9.8 x 3.94 inches; 1.96 Pounds
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ February 29, 2020
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ legend sandy
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B0859QZD6F

VARIETY CHEW TOYS FOR PUPPIES TEETHING: Natural rubber toys, specially designed for teething puppies and small dogs, meet all requirements. Thick ring dog toy was born to chew, available for long-lasting engagement, vent energy out and ease stress. 4 different shape rubber toys with hand-knotted rope are soft enough and bouncy, chewing to relieve sore & itchy teething issues. Bumps and grooves on them help to gum massage, fresh breath, scrape from the plaque, tartar to hidden germs.
SELF & INTERACTIVE PLAYING DOG TOYS FOR BOREDOM: Dogs will never stop getting fun from the squeaky toys. Frog and giraffe Plush dog toys are designed for self-playing. Inner squeaker makes a cute sound, attracts your pup, a great way to kill the boring time. Spiky ball for interactive games like chasing, fetching, etc. It helps to enhance the relationship between you and your furry friends. A perfect solution for fitness, exercise, and training.
DOG PULLING TOYS FOR INDOOR & OUTDOOR: Dog rope toys with plenty of uses, comes in 5 different varieties that offer to fetch and tug-of-war games, ideal gift for your pup. Whether at home or outdoors, rope toys with handles are perfect for dog to play with you or their friends. Using them as a puppy tooth floss cleaning toys, keep dental hygiene. All adopted natural cotton fibers, tightly hand-knotted, safe and washable.
SAFE & FUN FOR YOUR BEST FRIEND: Get 14 in one buy. A perfect combination of all kinds of dog toys, stimulate a dog’s mental and physical, cooperate to keep your puppy grow up happy and healthy. 100% non-toxic, BPA free, chewing and playing without smell. Not for aggressive chewers. Welcome to contact us before or after your purchase with any questions. If you are unsatisfied, we guarantee a full refund or replacement for no reason.
